caller_intent: Mary Baker wants to process a claim payment (claim #136) and inquire about online payment options and enrollment in a customer portal for future access to policy documents and claim information.
resolution_steps: Agent verifies claim number (corrected from 137 to 136) and confirms documents were received.
Agent offers enrollment in a customer center portal for online payments and claim management.
Agent explains payment options (credit card or check) and confirms Mary will use credit card.
Agent schedules a callback after making a quick call to finalize payment setup.
Agent confirms Mary will sign and return a quote via the portal.
systems_referenced: Customer center portal (for policy access and payments)
summary: Mary Baker discusses processing a claim payment (claim #136) with Maria from Alliance Insurance Services. The agent guides her through online payment options, enrolls her in a customer portal, and schedules a callback to finalize payment setup. The conversation includes verification of claim details and confirmation of credit card payment method.
